ntshav ntshav: Lub xeev ntawm cov teeb meem suav nrog cov khoom siv hluav taws xob (ions thiab electrons)
ionic: Bond tsim los ntawm attraction ntawm oppositely them ions
covalent: Bond tsim los ntawm kev sib koom ntawm electrons ntawm atoms
nws yog xim hlau: Bond tsim los ntawm attraction ntawm zoo hlau cations thiab delocalised electrons
kev sib npaug: Kev sib npaug tshuaj nrog cov lej sib npaug ntawm cov atoms ntawm txhua lub ntsiab ntawm ob sab
mole: Chav tsev siv los ntsuas tus nqi ntawm cov khoom (Avogadro tus naj npawb ntawm cov khoom)
pawg naj npawb: Summing ntawm protons thiab neutrons nyob rau hauv ib tug atom lub nucleus
tus lej atomic: Tus naj npawb ntawm cov protons nyob rau hauv ib lub atom lub nucleus (txiav txim siab lub cev)
isotope: Atoms ntawm tib lub caij nrog ntau tus lej ntawm neutrons
oxidation: Kev poob ntawm electrons los ntawm ib qho atom lossis molecule
txo: Tau txais ntawm electrons los ntawm ib qho atom lossis molecule
redox: Cov tshuaj tiv thaiv tshuaj muaj xws li oxidation thiab txo cov txheej txheem
activation zog: Yam tsawg kawg nkaus uas yuav tsum tau muaj rau cov tshuaj tiv thaiv tshuaj tshwm sim
catalyst: Cov tshuaj uas nce tus nqi ntawm cov tshuaj tiv thaiv tshuaj tsis tau noj
thermodynamics: Ceg ntawm chemistry cuam tshuam nrog cua sov, ua haujlwm, kub, thiab lub zog
endothermic: Cov tshuaj tiv thaiv uas nqus cua sov los ntawm ib puag ncig
exothermic: Cov tshuaj tiv thaiv uas tso cua sov rau ib puag ncig
